001package org.consensusj.jsonrpc;
002
003/**
004 * JSON-RPC returned HTTP status other than 200
005 * Additional information is usually in JSON-RPC response
006 * TODO: See TODO in parent class {@link JsonRpcException}
007 * @see org.consensusj.jsonrpc.JsonRpcException
008 */
009public class JsonRpcStatusException extends JsonRpcException {
010    public final String httpMessage;
011    public final int httpCode;
012    public final int jsonRpcCode;
013    public final String response;
014    public final JsonRpcResponse<?> responseJson;
015
016    /**
017     * Default Constructor
018     *
019     * @param message Error message from Json if available, else http status message
020     * @param httpCode HTTP status code, e.g. 404
021     * @param httpMessage HTTP status message, e.g. "Not found"
022     * @param jsonRPCCode Integer error code in JSON response, if any
023     * @param responseBody responseBody body as string
024     * @param responseBodyJson responseBody body as Json Map
025     */
026    public JsonRpcStatusException(String message, int httpCode, String httpMessage, int jsonRPCCode, String responseBody, JsonRpcResponse<?> responseBodyJson ) {
027        super(message);
028        this.httpCode = httpCode;
029        this.httpMessage = httpMessage;
030        this.jsonRpcCode = jsonRPCCode;
031        this.response = responseBody;
032        this.responseJson = responseBodyJson;
033    }
034}
